title: Wind Farm Decommissioning Cost Estimate
description: As part of the initial planning, a developer needs to estimate the cost to decommission a wind farm at the end of its 25-year life.

tasks.description: Identify all required decommissioning activities, including turbine disassembly, foundation removal, and site restoration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive list of decommissioning tasks.

tasks.description: Estimate the cost for each activity based on industry benchmarks and the number of turbines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a line-item cost breakdown.

tasks.description: Estimate the potential salvage value from recycling steel and other components.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a potential revenue offset from salvage.

tasks.description: Calculate the net decommissioning cost and the amount that needs to be set aside in a bond or fund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the final net cost estimate.
